name: Humble Oil & Refining Company v. Koppenheffer et ux., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Humble Oil & Refining Co. v. Koppenheffer

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Humble Oil & Refining Company v. Koppenheffer et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed, each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James 11. Stewart, Jr., with him Nauman, Smith, Shissler and Hall, for appellee.
Joseph E. Pappano, and Pappano and Pappano, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Humble Oil & Refining Company v. Koppenheffer et ux., Appellants.
Argued May 28, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
John J. Krafsig, for appellants.
James 11. Stewart, Jr., with him Nauman, Smith, Shissler and Hall, for appellee.
Joseph E. Pappano, and Pappano and Pappano, for appellee.
October 9, 1969:
